issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Hi All, Setup is following: a) DB+Backend - Host 1 b) UFS - Host 2 c) CC/SC - Host 3 d) NC - Host 4 Configuration used: a) Riak+Riak-cs+Stanchion - Host 4 b) Networking mode: EDGE c) Storage backend: Overlay Package version: {code} eucalyptus-common-java-libs-4.0.0-0.0.867.20140411git0cd00881.el6.x86_64 eucalyptus-imaging-worker-image-1.0.0-0.140.140410gitef872be.el6.x86_64 comments.body: This is fallout from EUCA-8746 that broke the portion of euca-describe-nodes that contacts the compute service.  Things should be fixed in commit {{43133d7}}, which for once makes the admin tools' code slightly better.

Thanks [~gholms]. This is fixed. 

{code}
[root@odc-d-06-02 ~]# euca-describe-nodes 
NODE	cloud4		10.104.10.208	NOTREADY	
NODE	cloud4		10.104.1.208	ENABLED	
INSTANCE	i-0fab2829
INSTANCE	i-c5bed7b6
eucalyptus-common-java-4.0.0-0.0.932.20140425git00ef0ef9.el6.x86_64
eucalyptus-sos-plugins-0.1.5-0.el6.noarch
eucalyptus-4.0.0-0.0.932.20140425git00ef0ef9.el6.x86_64
euca2ools-3.1.0-0.0.173.20140422git480fb98e.el6.noarch
eucalyptus-admin-tools-4.0.0-0.0.932.20140425git00ef0ef9.el6.noarch
eucalyptus-common-java-libs-4.0.0-0.0.932.20140425git00ef0ef9.el6.x86_64
eucalyptus-cloud-4.0.0-0.0.932.20140425git00ef0ef9.el6.x86_64
eucalyptus-imaging-worker-image-1.0.0-0.147.140425git34ea9af.el6.x86_64
eucalyptus-load-balancer-image-1.0.4-0.197.140422git81659ff.el6.x86_64
{code}
Is that really this bug, [~lwade]?  The error seems to be quite different.

Thanks gholms, actually this bug: ttps://eucalyptus.atlassian.net/browse/EUCA-9360

EDIT - removing cruft from ticket
